title: Available 1 Bed 1 Bath
posting_body: This apartment has wood-style floor in the living area and the kitchen, carpet in the bedroom(s), and tile in the bathroom(s).
The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, quartz counter-tops, and a dishwasher.
There is central AC and heat, in-unit laundry, and outside there is a patio/balcony.
Unit amenities include lighting fixtures, window coverings, and ceiling fans.

Community amenities include pool, fitness center, clubhouse, package receiving, on-site management, storage, on-site maintenance, night patrol, elevator, business center, TV resident lounge, outdoor yoga space, BBQ grills, bike storage, and bike paths.
Off-street parking available and garage parking for additional monthly fee.
A four minute drive to Interstate 35.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
